name: Darklight
flavorText: The cold-tempered steel of this weapon cradles a mote of pale light. Ancient beyond measure, its creator and original purpose is unknown, but the flail is now revered by the crusaders as a symbol for the role they play in the world: a light to pierce the darkness.
flavorTextHtml: The cold-tempered steel of this weapon cradles a mote of pale light. Ancient beyond measure, its creator and original purpose is unknown, but the flail is now revered by the crusaders as a symbol for the role they play in the world: a light to pierce the darkness.

secondary.textHtml: Fist of the Heavens now casts twice and deals 874% more damage. (Crusader Only) [800 - 1000]%
